title: please help me !
body:
okay so idk why but i havent been able to play this game for a long time..

every time i get to the dashboard after i install it it starts to download the game. it gets to 38% then closes the whole thing out. ive deleted and reinstalled like 50 times and same thing happens every time. how do i fix this so i can play the game..?

**please help me somebody.**

replies.body: Patching errors on the Legacy Client from 33-99% tell me that there may be some issues with your client contacting our server. I'd recommend making sure that your [**connection is optimized**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). Be sure to keep any active antiviruses disabled during this patching process!
